artist: Artist: Edward Ruscha; Artist: Mason Williams; Photographer: Patrick Blackwell; Author: Mason Williams; Author: Edward Ruscha; Publisher: Edward Ruscha and Mason Williams, American, born 1938; Printer: Blair Litho, Los Angeles
catalogue_raissonne: Foster 6; Engberg B6; The Open Book, pp.198-99
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
description: Softcover book, manila-colored paper cover with title printed in black ink; 36 photographic illustrations with text; 60pp.; spiral binding.
inscription: Primary inscription: front, printed in black ink \"ROYAL ROAD TEST\"; title page: \"ROYAL/ ROAD TEXT/ Mason Williams/ Edward Ruscha/ Patrick Blackwell\", followed by copyright page (verso), followed by inscription \"It was too directly bound to its own anguish to be anything other then a cry of negation; carrying within itself, the seeds of its own destruction\"; explanatory captions accompany 35 of 36 photographic reproductions, placed beside or underneath the photograph.
markings: Distributor\'s name and address stamped in black ink on copyright page. MIA ex-library markings on exterior and interior.
medium: Offset lithographic printing; spiral bound volume
provenance: Transferred from MIA Art Research and Reference Library, 1997.
title: Royal Road Test
